articles.title: Punxsutawney Phil prepares to issue his Groundhog Day weather verdict from Gobbler’s Knob
articles.description:
When Phil is deemed to have not seen his shadow, that is said to usher in an early spring. When he does see it, there will be six more weeks of winter.

The post Punxsutawney Phil prepares to issue his Groundhog Day weather verdict from Gobbler’s Knob appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Punxsutawney Phil will predict weather on February 2, 2026.
Phil's shadow sighting could mean six more weeks of winter for Boston.
An early spring prediction could boost local outdoor activities and tourism.

articles.title: Seahawks head coach Mike Macdonald grew up in Scituate and dreamed of running the Red Sox
articles.description:
"I loved the Red Sox because I was from Boston."

The post Seahawks head coach Mike Macdonald grew up in Scituate and dreamed of running the Red Sox appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Macdonald, Seahawks head coach, grew up in Scituate, Massachusetts.
He expressed a lifelong dream of becoming the Red Sox general manager.
Macdonald's story inspires local youth in Boston pursuing sports careers.

articles.title: The Carolinas emerge as new population boom states
articles.description:
In the next few years, domestic migration is going to play a larger role in states' growth or population decline.

The post The Carolinas emerge as new population boom states appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: The Carolinas are experiencing significant population growth due to domestic migration trends.
Boston residents may face increased competition for jobs as people relocate to the Carolinas.
This migration could impact housing availability and prices in Boston over the coming years.

articles.title: Watch: Patriots’ Super Bowl LX send-off rally
articles.description:
Robert Kraft, Mike Vrabel, and the Patriots' team captains are set to address the crowd.

The post Watch: Patriots’ Super Bowl LX send-off rally appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' Super Bowl LX send-off rally took place on February 1, 2026.
Robert Kraft and Mike Vrabel addressed fans, boosting local morale ahead of the game.
The event fosters community spirit and support for the team among Boston residents.
